comments.body: In my head, I would have expected this on the deletion handling function.
Oh, I see.  That makes sense.
return a slice of conditions?  I don't think the caller cares.
We don't handle the terminated condition here. I would prefer to keep it that simple with the two explicit ones.
~~where is the sorting? If there is one, please add a comment there.~~
// nothing to do if accepted names and NameConflict condition didn't change
